title: Perms banned
body: Was just wondering if a rioter could tell me why I was perma banned after what appears to be one game according to the reform card I got

replies.body:
Hey Servant Rider,

Speaking from generalities as I don't have the specifics of your case, Permanent Suspensions are generally given in two instances:

1. Players who exhibit extreme toxicity or negativity in the form of severe homophobia, racism, etc. may be permanently suspended with no intermediary punishments. 
2. Players who exhibit consistent toxicity or negativity without indications of reform may be permanently suspended after they've gone through some sort of punishment and showed no change in behavior afterwards. 

The reform card that you received may have only been from one match; however, not all of the matches that contributed to your Permanent Suspension are included in your reform card. If you have any additional questions regarding the Player Behavior systems, feel free to create a thread within the [**Player Behavior & Moderation**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) sub-boards, and we would be more than happy to discuss any questions or comments you have.

Hmm ok, thanks for the info. Probably cause I've been banned before then. 
Really wish LOL had a way to mute myself cause I just don't deal with stupid people well
